introduction.title: Hi! I'm Peter Evsikov
introduction.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer (React Native 7+ years)
introduction.description: Since end of 2017 I work only with React Native projects and want to go ahead. I'm really interested in all about mobile and web development. The React Native is not a silver bullet, but excellent tool for prototyping and MVP apps and sometimes much more.
